name: Jean Grey
info:
• 简体中文名: 琴·格蕾
  • 别名: Phoenix
  • 别名: 凤凰女
  • 别名: Marvel Girl
  • 别名: 琴·伊兰妮·格雷-萨默斯
  • 别名: Jean Elaine Grey-Summers
  • 性别: 女
  • 身高: 168cm
  • 体重: 130 lbs (58.97 kg)
  • 引用来源: https://marvel.fandom.com/wiki/Jean_Grey_(Earth-616)
detail: Jean Grey has been stated to be an Omega Level Mutant. She is also an Omega-Level Telepath and Omega-Level Telekinetic. By birth, Jean is among the most powerful telepaths, telekinetics, and psions. She is also one with the Phoenix Force, and while acting as its avatar she is one of the most powerful Abstract Entities in the Earth-616 universe. She also was considered to be a "Mutant Alpha-Psi", an Alpha Level Telepath, an Alpha-Level Mutant, and Psionic of Highest Order. As Dark Phoenix, she has been stated to be a global threat and to manifest cosmic-level powers. According to Prosh, her Comparative Mutagenic Power Register was of 8.9.
